import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import Header from '../../parts/header/Header.js' import Footer from '../../parts/footer/Footer.js' import { PopupWidget } from "react-calendly"; import './Products.css' class Products extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } render() { return (

Stretched Link in Card

Add the .stretched-link class to a link inside the card, and it will make the whole card clickable (the card will act as a link):

John Doe

Some example text some example text. John Doe is an architect and engineer

See Profile
